item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 9, 2025 at 11:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. It is as if you were on your phone (477 points | 72 comments)
2. Woman's DNA discovered in 20k year old deer-tooth pendant (34 points | 4 comments)
3. Vilhelm Hammershøi: the eminence in greys (3 points | discuss)
4. With AI you need to think bigger (44 points | 20 comments)
5. Aspartame aggravates atherosclerosis through insulin-triggered inflammation (19 points | 11 comments)
6. Exploring Polymorphism in C: Lessons from Linux and FFmpeg's Code Design (2019) (6 points | discuss)
7. Scientists discover an RNA that repairs DNA damage (58 points | 3 comments)
8. Improving on std:count_if()'s auto-vectorization (95 points | 29 comments)
9. El Salvador's crypto experiment ends in failure (29 points | 11 comments)
10. Show HN: Evolving Agents Framework (93 points | 16 comments)
11. Wine Releases Framework Mono 6.14 in Taking over the Mono Project (39 points | 4 comments)
12. Apple rearranged its XNU kernel with exclaves (37 points | 5 comments)
13. Idiomatic Go (2016) (54 points | 34 comments)
14. Bring Back Shortwave (20 points | 17 comments)
15. Paper Review: Variational Lossy Auto-Encoders (5 points | discuss)
16. Investigating an argument-dependent lookup issue and working around it (17 points | 1 comment)
17. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring for Full Stack Engineers in San Francisco ( | hide)
18. The Kernighan-Lin Search Algorithm (3 points | discuss)
19. An investigation into egg prices (72 points | 27 comments)
20. Ecosia is teaming up with Qwant to build a European search index (41 points | 7 comments)
21. My 16-month theanine self-experiment (708 points | 364 comments)
22. Show HN: I built a free SVG Web site (9 points | 7 comments)
23. Mysterious tunnels sketched by Leonardo may have been found (3 points | discuss)
24. Sublogic Flight Simulator (24 points | 10 comments)
25. Binocular Shot (47 points | 21 comments)
26. Nickel superconductor works above -233°C threshold at normal pressure (94 points | 15 comments)
27. 16-Bit to 1-Bit: Visual KV Cache Quantization for Efficient Multimodal LLMs (72 points | 1 comment)
28. I've been using Claude Code for a couple of days (166 points | 230 comments)
29. We built a modern data stack from scratch and reduced our bill by 70% (54 points | 35 comments)
30. Goravel: A Go framework inspired by Laravel (140 points | 110 comments)
